name: Reckless Onslaught
description:
The land of Satiria has been invaded by evil forces from the East. Your people have fled to the artic tundras and need to rebuild before the enemy catches up with you...

Controls

Left-click and drag to select units
Right-click to send units to that location
Middle-click and move to pan camera
Scroll-wheel to zoom camera
Left-click buildings for more information about that building

Important

If you want to house villagers in buildings like the Farm or the Woodcutters, you select them and right-click on the building.

You need to survive for 1 year to complete the game!
